messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content: I will do everything I can to end child poverty and get a fair deal for people in Bristol. I will protect the rights of tenants. I will campaign for a healthier Bristol. I will protect our NHS across the city.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will do everything I can to end child poverty and get a fair deal for people in Bristol.
I will protect the rights of tenants, ensure more people can rent safe, secure, and affordable accommodation, make three-year tenancies the norm, and ban Letting Agency fees.
I will campaign for a healthier Bristol by working for clean air, especially to protect the health of children and the elderly.
I will protect our NHS across the city to help our GPs and hospitals who have been pushed to breaking point.

mentions.candidate: Thangam Debbonaire was in your local area today

issues.health: Air pollution damages our health, especially the health of children and the elderly. I have been working for clean air in Bristol West and won't stop until our air is safe to breathe.

images.caption: Image of Thangam Debbonaire with a background of Bristol, including text outlining her pledges.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on local issues for the Bristol West constituency, emphasizing social welfare, housing, environment, and health services.
